issue.title: [CI][C++][Flight] Exercise UCX on CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18349](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18349). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
UCX doesn't seem enabled on any CI configuration for now.

We should have at least a nightly job with UCX enabled, for example one of the Conda or Ubuntu builds.
